products.name: Hydrating Cream
products.description: A deeply moisturizing cream that nourishes dry skin and helps restore hydration for a smooth, soft feel.

products.name: Cleansing Gel
products.description: A gentle foaming gel that removes impurities and excess oils while keeping the skin hydrated and soft.

products.name: Exfoliating Scrub (Gommage)
products.description: A gentle scrub that removes dead skin cells and impurities, leaving the skin smooth and refreshed.

products.name: Nourishing Night Cream
products.description: A rich night cream that replenishes moisture and supports skin regeneration overnight, perfect for dry skin.

products.name: Gentle Face Wash
products.description: A mild, non-stripping cleanser that removes dirt and makeup, suitable for sensitive skin types.

products.name: Clay Face Mask
products.description: A purifying clay mask that draws out impurities and excess oil for clear, balanced skin.

products.name: Moisturizing Toner
products.description: A hydrating toner that refreshes and balances the skin, leaving it soft and ready for moisturizing.

products.name: Deep Cleansing Mask
products.description: A deep-cleansing mask that removes impurities and tightens pores, giving your skin a refreshed, matte finish.

products.name: Daily Moisturizer
products.description: A lightweight moisturizer designed for everyday use, providing long-lasting hydration without feeling greasy.

products.name: Soothing Aloe Gel
products.description: An aloe-based gel that soothes irritated skin and reduces redness. Ideal for sensitive and sun-exposed skin.

products.name: Purifying Charcoal Mask
products.description: A detoxifying mask with activated charcoal that draws out impurities, leaving your skin clear and rejuvenated.

products.name: Lightweight Day Cream
products.description: A non-greasy day cream that provides hydration while protecting the skin from environmental stressors.

products.name: Micellar Water
products.description: A gentle, no-rinse micellar water that removes makeup and cleanses the skin without drying it out.

products.name: Anti-Blemish Face Wash
products.description: A targeted facial wash that helps reduce breakouts and excess oil, leaving the skin feeling refreshed.

products.name: Revitalizing Eye Cream
products.description: A soothing eye cream that reduces puffiness and dark circles while revitalizing the delicate skin around the eyes.
